content: chevron scarf designed for urth yarns materials 2 skeins urth uneek fingering size 61 along selvedge edge x 12 wide/154 x 30 5cm needle us 3/3 25mm straight or circular needles notions tapestry needle gauge 28 sts x 36 row = 4 /10 cm square in stockinette abbreviations co - cast on k knit s - slip sts stitches td - triple decrease - slip 2 sts as if to knit k1 pass 2 slipped sts over the k1 ws wrong side yo yarn over pattern notes the stitches will move into a chevron shape as worked and when blocked pattern co 130 row 1 - 8 knit row 9 s1 k1 *k1 yo k29 td k29 yo k1 repeat from * once k2 row 10 s1 purl all sts repeat row 9 -10 until work measures 61 /154cm from cast on edge repeat row 1 - 8 bind off weave in ends c 2019 urth yarns - 855 648 3392 - urthyarns com patterns@urthyarns com - ravelry id urthyarnscs
